name: Steve Jobs
title: Co-founder and CEO of Apple Inc.
background: Visionary entrepreneur who revolutionized personal computing, mobile phones, and digital media
education: Dropped out of Reed College, audited calligraphy classes
inspiration_quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
achievements: Built Apple into most valuable company
advice: Stay hungry, stay foolish. Focus on creating products that people don't know they need yet.

name: Elon Musk
title: CEO of Tesla and SpaceX
background: Serial entrepreneur revolutionizing electric vehicles, space exploration, and sustainable energy
education: Bachelor's in Economics and Physics from University of Pennsylvania
inspiration_quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
achievements: First private company to send humans to space
advice: Think from first principles and don't be afraid to challenge conventional wisdom.

name: Bill Gates
title: Co-founder of Microsoft, Philanthropist
background: Built Microsoft into world's largest software company, now focuses on global health and education
education: Dropped out of Harvard University to start Microsoft
inspiration_quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
advice: Focus on learning continuously and use your success to help solve the world's biggest problems.

name: Oprah Winfrey
title: Media Executive, Actress, Talk Show Host
background: Built media empire from humble beginnings, became one of most influential people in entertainment
education: Tennessee State University (Communications)
inspiration_quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
achievements: Most influential talk show in history
advice: Turn your wounds into wisdom and use your platform to lift others up.

name: Jeff Bezos
title: Founder and Executive Chairman of Amazon
background: Started Amazon as online bookstore, grew it into world's largest e-commerce and cloud company
education: Bachelor's in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science from Princeton
inspiration_quote: I knew that if I failed I wouldn't regret that, but I knew the one thing I might regret is not trying.
advice: Be stubborn on vision but flexible on details. Always start with the customer and work backwards.

name: Satya Nadella
title: CEO of Microsoft
background: Started as a software engineer, worked his way up through various technical and leadership roles
education: Computer Science degree from Manipal Institute of Technology, MS in Computer Science from University of Wisconsin
inspiration_quote: Our industry does not respect tradition - it only respects innovation.
achievements: Grew Microsoft's market cap from $300B to $3T+
advice: Focus on learning continuously and empowering others around you.

name: Sheryl Sandberg
title: Former COO of Meta (Facebook)
background: Built Facebook's advertising business from $9M to $100B+, advocate for women in leadership
education: BA in Economics from Harvard, MBA from Harvard Business School
inspiration_quote: Leadership is about making others better as a result of your presence.
advice: Lean in to challenges and don't let fear hold you back from pursuing leadership roles.

name: Tim Cook
title: CEO of Apple Inc.
background: Succeeded Steve Jobs as Apple CEO, led company to become first $3 trillion company
education: Bachelor's in Industrial Engineering from Auburn, MBA from Duke
inspiration_quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is: What are you doing for others?
advice: Focus on leaving the world better than you found it, and never compromise on your values.

name: Reed Hastings
title: Co-founder and Executive Chairman of Netflix
background: Transformed entertainment industry by pioneering streaming and original content
education: Bachelor's in Mathematics from Bowdoin College, Master's in Computer Science from Stanford
inspiration_quote: The best managers figure out how to get great outcomes by setting the appropriate context.
advice: Be willing to cannibalize your own business model before someone else does.

name: Fei-Fei Li
title: Professor at Stanford, Co-Director of Human-Centered AI Institute
background: Pioneer in computer vision and AI, created ImageNet dataset that revolutionized machine learning
education: PhD in Electrical Engineering from Caltech, BA in Physics from Princeton
inspiration_quote: AI is not just about technology, it's about humanity.
advice: Pursue your passion with persistence, and always consider the human impact of your work.

name: Jensen Huang
title: Co-founder and CEO of NVIDIA
background: Built NVIDIA into world's most valuable semiconductor company, pioneering AI and graphics computing
education: Bachelor's in Electrical Engineering from Oregon State, Master's from Stanford
inspiration_quote: The more successful you are, the more help you should give.
advice: Focus on solving problems that others think are impossible - that's where the biggest opportunities lie.

name: Demis Hassabis
title: CEO and Co-founder of DeepMind (Google)
background: Neuroscientist turned AI researcher, co-founded DeepMind which created AlphaGo and AlphaFold
education: PhD in Cognitive Neuroscience from University College London
inspiration_quote: AI will be one of the most important technologies ever developed by humanity.
advice: Combine different disciplines to create breakthrough innovations.

name: Susan Kare
title: Iconic Digital Designer
background: Designed the original icons and interface elements for Apple Macintosh, including the trash can and command symbol
education: BA in Art from Mount Holyoke College, MA in Fine Arts from New York University
inspiration_quote: Good design is about making things understandable, memorable, and delightful.
advice: Pay attention to details that others might overlook - they often make the biggest difference.

name: Melinda French Gates
title: Co-founder of Pivotal Ventures, Philanthropist
background: Former Microsoft executive turned philanthropist, focusing on gender equity and social impact
education: Bachelor's in Computer Science and Economics from Duke, MBA from Fuqua School of Business
inspiration_quote: When we invest in women and girls, we invest in the people who invest in everyone else.
advice: Use your skills and platform to create positive change in the world.

name: Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw
title: Executive Chairperson of Biocon
background: Pioneered biotechnology in India, built Biocon into a global biopharmaceutical company
education: Bachelor's in Zoology from Bangalore University, Postgraduate Diploma in Malting and Brewing
inspiration_quote: I believe that entrepreneurship is about solving problems and creating value.
achievements: Built Biocon from garage startup to $1B+ company
advice: Focus on solving real problems that matter to society and the environment.

name: Brian Chesky
title: Co-founder and CEO of Airbnb
background: Co-founded Airbnb from his apartment, grew it into a $100B+ company
education: BFA in Industrial Design from Rhode Island School of Design
inspiration_quote: Build something 100 people love, not something 1 million people kind of like.
advice: Focus obsessively on your users and create experiences that people love.

name: Katie Bouman
title: Assistant Professor at Caltech, Computer Vision Researcher
background: Led development of algorithms that created the first image of a black hole
education: PhD in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science from MIT
inspiration_quote: Science is a collaborative effort, and breakthroughs come from diverse teams working together.
advice: Don't be afraid to tackle seemingly impossible problems - that's where the biggest discoveries happen.

name: Alex Karp
title: CEO of Palantir Technologies
background: Co-founded Palantir, a data analytics company focused on big data analytics and cybersecurity
education: PhD in Philosophy from University of Frankfurt, JD from Stanford Law School
inspiration_quote: The future belongs to those who can make sense of vast amounts of data.
advice: Combine technical skills with deep thinking about societal implications.

name: Mary Barra
title: CEO of General Motors
background: Leading GM's transformation to electric vehicles and sustainable transportation
education: Bachelor's in Electrical Engineering from General Motors Institute, MBA from Stanford
inspiration_quote: The future is electric, and we're committed to leading that transformation.
achievements: First female CEO of major automaker
advice: Embrace change and lead transformation rather than waiting for it to happen to you.

name: Marc Benioff
title: Chairman and CEO of Salesforce
background: Pioneered cloud-based software-as-a-service (SaaS) model with Salesforce CRM
education: Bachelor's in Business Administration from USC
inspiration_quote: The business of business is improving the state of the world.
advice: Use business as a platform for change and always give back to the community.
